member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.AnalyticsService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.AnalyticsService.Scopes
member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.AnalyticsService.Scopes.Analytics
member.summary: View and manage your Google Analytics data

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.AnalyticsService.Scopes.AnalyticsReadonly
member.summary: View your Google Analytics data

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns Analytics report data for a profile.
member.param: Required - Must match pattern ga:[0-9]+ - Unique table ID for retrieving report data. Table ID is of the form ga:XXXX, where XXXX is the Analytics profile ID.
start-date - Required - Must match pattern [0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2} - Start date for fetching report data. All requests should specify a start date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
end-date - Required - Must match pattern [0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2} - End date for fetching report data. All requests should specify an end date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Required - Must match pattern ga:.+ - A comma-separated list of Analytics metrics. E.g., 'ga:visits,ga:pageviews'. At least one metric must be specified to retrieve a valid Analytics report.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.QuotaUser
member.summary: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.Dimensions
member.summary: A comma-separated list of Analytics dimensions. E.g., 'ga:browser,ga:city'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.EndDate
member.summary: End date for fetching report data. All requests should specify an end date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.Filters
member.summary: A comma-separated list of dimension or metric filters to be applied to the report data.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.Ids
member.summary: Unique table ID for retrieving report data. Table ID is of the form ga:XXXX, where XXXX is the Analytics profile ID.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.MaxResults
member.summary: The maximum number of entries to include in this feed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.Metrics
member.summary: A comma-separated list of Analytics metrics. E.g., 'ga:visits,ga:pageviews'. At least one metric must be specified to retrieve a valid Analytics report.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.Segment
member.summary: An Analytics advanced segment to be applied to the report data.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.Sort
member.summary: A comma-separated list of dimensions or metrics that determine the sort order for the report data.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.StartDate
member.summary: Start date for fetching report data. All requests should specify a start date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.DataResource.GetRequest.StartIndex
member.summary: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Analytics.v2_4.ManagementResource.GoalsResource.List(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Lists goals to which the user has access.
member.param: Required - Account ID to retrieve goals for. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts that user has access to.
Required - Web property ID to retrieve goals for. Can either be a specific web property ID or '~all', which refers to all the web properties that user has access to.
Required - Profile ID to retrieve goals for. Can either be a specific profile ID or '~all', which refers to all the profiles that user has access to.
